title: Stony Batter Presents “The Complete History of America (abridged)” (Mercersburg Academy)
text: ( Source : Mercersburg Academy ) Stony Batter Players , Mercersburg 's student theatre troupe, will present The Complete History of America (abridged) in the Burgin Center for the Arts' Hale Studio Theatre October 16-18 as part of this year's
